name: splitLines
signature: <E, R>(self: Stream<string, E, R>) => Stream<string, E, R>
description:
Splits strings on newlines. Handles both Windows newlines (`\r\n`) and UNIX
newlines (`\n`).
documentation:
Splits strings on newlines. Handles both Windows newlines (`\r\n`) and UNIX
newlines (`\n`).
